title: 惊现史上最穷八级！
author: 鬼酱丶
txt_content: 好不容易水上八级，连发锭的钱都莫得，穷哭

replies.author: LM_FC
replies.txt_content: 没事看下有没有奖励A.A果然出现了！奖励怪！

replies.author: tamashii
replies.txt_content: 太穷了，我也一样穷。恭喜八级

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content: 哇太强了

replies.author: mcpanglei
replies.txt_content: 膜拜，我也要8级了，大神牛逼

replies.author: ItsZeroHikari
replies.txt_content:
恭喜8级~
发锭永远轮不上我系列

replies.author: Sinbad_Official
replies.txt_content: 好可怜，唯一一个锭被抢了还没评分

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
你不是有锭吗
为什么不全发
这样也不会没人评分
是吧

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content: 那我可能是最穷十级

replies.author: dashuzhi
replies.txt_content: 莫哭，钱财乃是身外之物，生不带来死不带去

replies.author: Allure倾城
replies.txt_content: 我也很穷，穷的一批啊

replies.author: means666
replies.txt_content: 在？我半个锭都没有

replies.author: hankexin
replies.txt_content: 努力升级中，

replies.author: KingADwight
replies.txt_content: 我会说混到现在也没多少资本，可能是要一穷到底了
水一波，哈哈哈

replies.author: 印花机
replies.txt_content: 诶嘿，膜拜大佬，六个绿宝石还行

replies.author: zzhilling
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: [sqlm]
replies.txt_content: 恭喜大佬8级了

replies.author: 云雾
replies.txt_content:
金粒这种东西
多捞点就有了

replies.author: 星☆光
replies.txt_content: 楼主好歹发1锭了，不像我8级、9级都没发锭

replies.author: ItsZeroHikari
replies.txt_content: 我才是最穷的8级

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content: 你实际上还有16块金锭的说

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content: 我才是最穷的好不好,看金锭数

replies.author: 鬼酱丶
replies.txt_content: 这是炸出8级用户三连么

replies.author: D_xuehen
replies.txt_content: 还可以的吧 233

replies.author: zjemf
replies.txt_content: 太穷了，我也一样穷。恭喜八级

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 嗯，恭喜8吧，话说应该升到8级多少都有点货的吧。

replies.txt_content:

嗯，恭喜8吧，话说应该升到8级多少都有点货的吧。
那我怕是已经穷到你想不到的地步了

replies.author: lironghui
replies.txt_content: 我也一样穷
